oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Inter channel crosstalk in fiber bragg grating based optical add drop multiplexer
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NARAYANKHEDKAR, SK
SHEVGAONKAR, RK
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In an fiber Bragg grating-based optical add/drop multiplexer the dense wavelength division multiplexed (DWDM) data transmission results in data distortion in the form of inter symbol interference and inter channel crosstalk. This papers presents a study on the crosstalk performance of fiber Bragg gratings (FBG). (C) 2002 Elsevier Science Inc. All rights reserved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 6th Joint Conference on Information Sciences (JCIS 2002),RES TRIANGLE PK, NORTH CAROLINA,MAR 08-13, 2002
